author: visitor
content: Hi, I'm having trouble logging into my account. Can you help?

author: agent
content: Sure! Can you tell me if you're getting any error messages when you try to log in?

author: visitor
content: Yes, it says 'Incorrect password,' but I’m sure my password is right.

author: agent
content: No worries. It might be a case of a typo or a saved password issue. Could you try resetting your password using the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page?

author: visitor
content: I already tried that. I didn't receive the password reset email.

author: agent
content: Let's check if the email is getting filtered into your spam or junk folder. Could you take a look there?

author: system
content: group.changed

author: visitor
content: I've checked, and it's not there.

author: agent
content: Alright, let's try another method. I can manually trigger a password reset email for you. Please give me a moment.

author: system
content: agent.changed

author: agent
content: Hi, just taking over your request. I've manually triggered the password reset email. It should arrive in your inbox shortly.

author: visitor
content: I got the email now. Resetting the password...

author: agent
content: Great! Let me know if you run into any issues while resetting your password.

author: visitor
content: Password reset successful, but now it's giving me an 'Account locked' message.

author: agent
content: That's probably due to multiple failed login attempts. I can unlock your account for you. One moment, please.

author: system
content: visitor.idle

author: agent
content: Your account has been unlocked. Please try logging in again with your new password.

author: visitor
content: It worked! I'm finally in.

author: agent
content: Glad to hear that! If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out.

author: visitor
content: Thanks a lot for the help. I was getting really frustrated.

author: agent
content: I completely understand. We’re here to help, so don't hesitate to contact us if you run into any more issues.

author: system
content: visitor.idle

author: visitor
content: Just one more thing, can you check if there are any security alerts on my account?

author: agent
content: I’ve checked your account, and there are no security alerts. Everything looks secure on our end.

author: visitor
content: That's a relief. Thank you.

author: agent
content: No problem at all. Keeping your account secure is our priority. If you need anything else, just let us know.
